message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I believe will bring you great value. After careful consideration, I'm willing to let it go for a price that I think is fair and reasonable.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in this product, $14000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $10000 for it, but that's my final offer.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $10000 is a bit lower than I'm willing to go. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between my original offer and your counteroffer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $11000, and I believe that's a fair price that benefits both of us.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I can see that we're getting closer to a mutually agreeable price. I'm willing to make a small concession to meet you closer to your target price, but I still believe the product is worth a bit more than $11000.
